New Records: The Thunder improved to 7-0, winning all seven games by at least 12 points.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander set a career high with seven assists in the first quarter.
Key Match Events: Isaiah Joe hit three straight three-pointers to extend the lead by 24 points in the third quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: The Thunder's win and perfect record were highlighted as a strong performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder made 12 of 31 three-pointers, while the Magic struggled with a 35.4% shooting percentage.
Key Magic players like Paolo Banchero and Wendell Carter Jr. were absent, impacting their performance.
